availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: James H. Letcher (high gentleman, garrard county)

body.p: Garrard County, Kentucky, high gentleman. Married to Nancy T. Kennedy Letcher. Father of Bettie Letcher, Mary Letcher, Narine Letcher, James Letcher, Bob Letcher, Same Letcher, Ella Letcher, and Josh Letcher. Judge of Garrard County Court in 1850. High gentleman in Garrard County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Garrard County, Lancaster, p. 9.
“Garrard County,” Louisville Daily Courier (Louisville, Ky.), May 19, 1851, p. 3.
Find A Grave, "James H. Letcher (September 1, 1801-February 2, 1875)," Memorial #88469756, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/88469756 (accessed May 18, 2018).
